head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BERGER, STUART SOL

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BERGER, STUART SOL

block.p: BERGER-Stuart Sol. On July 27, 2000. Adored, beloved husband of Janice. Cherished father of Susan and Edward, proud and respected grandfather of Heather. Dear brother of Richard. A builder...of lives, loves, relationships & eternal devotion. Services 10 AM, Sunday at ''Gutterman's'', 175 Long Beach Road, Rockville Centre, New York.
